pages.index: Welcome to AquaBet - Premier Casino Cruise Party Planner ☰ About Services Pricing Gallery Go Your Ultimate Casino Cruise Experience Awaits! Dive into a world of excitement, glamour, and endless fun with AquaBet. Let us turn your next event into a high-seas adventure you and your guests will never forget! Founded by a team of experienced event planners and gaming enthusiasts, we specialize in creating unforgettable casino-themed parties on luxurious cruise liners. Our mission is to provide a unique and exhilarating experience that combines the elegance of a cruise with the excitement of a casino. Our dedicated team works tirelessly to ensure every detail of your event is perfect, from the finest casino equipment to professional dealers and stunning entertainment. Whether you're planning a corporate event, a private celebration, or a themed party, AquaBet tailors each experience to meet your specific needs and desires. We take pride in our commitment to excellence, ensuring that every aspect of your casino cruise party exceeds your expectations. Join us for a journey filled with glamour, excitement, and unparalleled entertainment. Our events feature a variety of classic casino games, professional dealers, and elegant entertainment options. Whether you're hosting a corporate gathering, celebrating a special occasion, or planning a themed party, AquaBet ensures every detail is meticulously crafted to create a memorable and enjoyable experience for all guests. From themed parties to custom itineraries, our team works closely with you to design a cruise that exceeds expectations. Whether you envision a high-energy party atmosphere or a sophisticated gala, AquaBet delivers unparalleled service, ensuring your event on the water is nothing short of spectacular. Elevate Your Cruise Experience with AquaBet's Unique Services At AquaBet, we go beyond traditional casino parties to offer a range of unique and exciting services aboard luxurious cruise liners. Our goal is to provide guests with an unforgettable experience that combines the thrill of gaming with the luxury of a cruise vacation. Whether you're hosting a large corporate event or an intimate gathering, AquaBet ensures every detail is meticulously planned to exceed your expectations. Themed Casino Nights Immerse yourself in themed casino environments such as "James Bond Casino Royale" or "Las Vegas Extravaganza," complete with bespoke décor and tailored entertainment.ы from £2,000 Exclusive VIP Packages Enjoy the ultimate luxury with our VIP packages, offering private gaming areas, premium beverages, and personalized concierge services. £5,000 Interactive Gaming Experiences Engage guests with interactive gaming options like poker tournaments, blackjack challenges, and customized gaming competitions. Prices vary based on customization and duration Custom Cruise Itineraries Design bespoke cruise itineraries that include casino nights, shore excursions, and onboard activities tailored to your group's interests. Pricing dependent on itinerary length AquaBet Bonuses: Double Your Fun at Sea! Join us aboard our luxurious cruise liner and take advantage of an exclusive bonus from AquaBet! All new participants of our casino parties are eligible for a 50% bonus on their first deposit. This means that when you deposit £100, you’ll receive an additional £50 to play with. Whether you're a seasoned gambler or a casual player, this bonus gives you more opportunities to win big and enjoy the thrilling casino experience that only AquaBet can offer. Don’t miss out on this exciting offer – start your adventure with AquaBet today and make the most of your time at sea! Choose Your Perfect Ticket for an Unforgettable Casino Cruise Embark on a thrilling casino cruise adventure with AquaBet! We offer a range of ticket options to suit every guest, ensuring an exceptional experience filled with excitement, luxury, and unparalleled entertainment. Select the ticket that best fits your needs and get ready for an unforgettable journey on the high seas. Standard Ticket Enjoy access to all the main casino games and entertainment areas. Perfect for those who want to experience the thrill of the casino without any extras. £100 per person Buy Premium Ticket Includes all the benefits of the Standard Ticket plus priority boarding, complimentary welcome drinks, and access to premium gaming tables. £250 per person Buy VIP Ticket Experience the luxury of VIP treatment with exclusive access to private gaming areas, a dedicated host, premium dining options, and a luxury gift bag. £500 per person Buy Ultimate Package The ultimate casino cruise experience with everything included from the VIP Ticket, plus a private suite, personalized concierge service, and exclusive shore excursions. £1,000 per person Buy Top Casino Games on Our Cruise At AquaBet, we bring the electrifying atmosphere of the casino to the open seas. Our cruise offers a wide array of casino games that cater to both seasoned players and newcomers. Step into our glamorous gaming areas, where you can test your luck and skills against the backdrop of the ocean. Here are three of our most popular games that guarantee an unforgettable gaming experience.s Blackjack A timeless classic where strategy meets chance. Try to beat the dealer by getting as close to 21 as possible without going over. Blackjack is a game of skill and strategy that offers thrilling play for both novice and experienced players. Roulette Experience the elegance and excitement of the spinning wheel. Place your bets on your favorite numbers, colors, or sections and watch as the wheel determines your fate. Roulette is a game of pure chance that promises excitement with every spin. Texas Hold'em Poker The ultimate test of skill, strategy, and psychological acumen. Compete against other players in this popular poker variant, where the best hand wins. Texas Hold'em Poker is perfect for those who enjoy a competitive and social gaming experience. pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - AquaBet: Your Trusted Casino Cruise Party Planner ☰ About Services Pricing Gallery Go Privacy Policy AquaBet ("we", "our", "us") is committed to protecting and respecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website , including any other media form, media channel, mobile website, or mobile application related or connected thereto (collectively, the "Site"). Please read this privacy policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the site. Information We Collect We may collect information about you in a variety of ways. The information we may collect on the Site includes: Personal Data Personally identifiable information, such as your name, shipping address, email address, and telephone number, and demographic information, such as your age, gender, hometown, and interests, that you voluntarily give to us when you register with the Site or when you choose to participate in various activities related to the Site, such as online chat and message boards. Derivative Data Information our servers automatically collect when you access the Site, such as your IP address, your browser type, your operating system, your access times, and the pages you have viewed directly before and after accessing the Site. Financial Data Financial information, such as data related to your payment method (e.g., valid credit card number, card brand, expiration date) that we may collect when you purchase, order, return, exchange, or request information about our services from the Site. We store only very limited, if any, financial information that we collect. Otherwise, all financial information is stored by our payment processor, and you are encouraged to review their privacy policy and contact them directly for responses to your questions. Use of Your Information Having accurate information about you permits us to provide you with a smooth, efficient, and customized experience. Specifically, we may use information collected about you via the Site to: Create and manage your account. Email you regarding your account or order. Fulfill and manage purchases, orders, payments, and other transactions related to the Site. Generate a personal profile about you to make future visits to the Site more personalized. Increase the efficiency and operation of the Site. Monitor and analyze usage and trends to improve your experience with the Site. Notify you of updates to the Site. Offer new products, services, and/or recommendations to you. Perform other business activities as needed. Disclosure of Your Information We may share information we have collected about you in certain situations. Your information may be disclosed as follows: By Law or to Protect Rights If we believe the release of information about you is necessary to respond to legal process, to investigate or remedy potential violations of our policies, or to protect the rights, property, and safety of others, we may share your information as permitted or required by any applicable law, rule, or regulation. Third-Party Service Providers We may share your information with third parties that perform services for us or on our behalf, including payment processing, data analysis, email delivery, hosting services, customer service, and marketing assistance. Marketing Communications With your consent, or with an opportunity for you to withdraw consent, we may share your information with third parties for marketing purposes, as permitted by law. Business Transfers We may share or transfer your information in connection with, or during negotiations of, any merger, sale of company assets, financing, or acquisition of all or a portion of our business to another company. Security of Your Information We use administrative, technical, and physical security measures to help protect your personal information. While we have taken reasonable steps to secure the personal information you provide to us, please be aware that despite our efforts, no security measures are perfect or impenetrable, and no method of data transmission can be guaranteed against any interception or other type of misuse. Controls for Do-Not-Track Features Most web browsers and some mobile operating systems include a Do-Not-Track ("DNT") feature or setting you can activate to signal your privacy preference not to have data about your online browsing activities monitored and collected. No uniform technology standard for recognizing and implementing DNT signals has been finalized. As such, we do not currently respond to DNT browser signals or any other mechanism that automatically communicates your choice not to be tracked online. If a standard for online tracking is adopted that we must follow in the future, we will inform you about that practice in a revised version of this Privacy Policy. Options Regarding Your Information You may at any time review or change the information in your account or terminate your account by: Logging into your account settings and updating your account. Contacting us using the contact information provided below. Upon your request to terminate your account, we will deactivate or delete your account and information from our active databases. However, some information may be retained in our files to prevent fraud, troubleshoot problems, assist with any investigations, enforce our Terms of Use and/or comply with legal requirements. Emails and Communications If you no longer wish to receive correspondence, emails, or other communications from us, you may opt-out by: Noting your preferences at the time you register your account with the Site. Logging into your account settings and updating your preferences. Contacting us using the contact information provided below. Contact Us If you have questions or comments about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at: Email: aquabet@gmail.com England Address 13 Marine Parade, Southend-on-Sea SS1 2EJ, United Kingdom Email aquabet@gmail.com Phone +44-7700-900123 About Services Pricing Gallery Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions Disclaimer
pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions - AquaBet: Rules for Our Casino Cruise Services ☰ About Services Pricing Gallery Go Terms and Conditions Welcome to AquaBet! These Terms and Conditions govern the use of AquaBet's services and website located . By accessing or using our services, you agree to abide by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please refrain from using our services. 1. Definitions In these Terms and Conditions, the following terms have the meanings assigned to them: "AquaBet" refers to our company, its subsidiaries, affiliates, and any related entities. "Services" refers to the casino party planning and related services offered by AquaBet. "User" refers to any individual or entity that accesses or uses our services. 2. Acceptance of Terms By using our services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and accepted these Terms and Conditions. If you are using our services on behalf of a business or organization, you confirm that you have the authority to bind that entity to these terms. 3. Eligibility To use our services, you must be at least 18 years old or of legal age in your jurisdiction. By using our services, you confirm that you meet these eligibility criteria. If you are under 18, you are not permitted to use our services. 4. Services Provided AquaBet specializes in organizing casino-themed parties aboard cruise liners. Our services include event planning, casino games and equipment rental, professional staffing, venue selection, and entertainment options. 5. User Responsibilities As a user of our services, you agree to: Provide accurate and complete information during registration. Maintain the security and confidentiality of your account. Notify us promptly of any unauthorized account use or security breaches. Abide by all applicable laws and regulations related to your use of our services. 6. Payment Terms All payments for our services are due at the time of booking or as specified in the service agreement. We accept credit cards, debit cards, and other electronic payment methods as specified on our website. You agree to pay all fees and charges incurred in connection with your use of our services. 7. Cancellations and Refunds Our cancellation and refund policy is as follows: Cancellations made 30 days or more before the event will receive a full refund. Cancellations made 15 to 29 days before the event will receive a 50% refund. Cancellations made less than 14 days before the event are non-refundable. All cancellation requests must be made in writing to aquabet@gmail.com. 8. Intellectual Property All content, trademarks, and other intellectual property on our website are the property of AquaBet or our licensors. You may not reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works from any content without our prior written consent. 9. Limitation of Liability AquaBet shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from or related to your use of our services, including, but not limited to, loss of profits, data, or other intangible losses, even if we have been advised of the possibility of such damages. 10. Indemnification You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless AquaBet, its affiliates, and their respective officers, directors, employees, and agents from and against any and all claims, damages, losses, liabilities, costs, and expenses (including reasonable attorneys' fees) arising out of or in any way connected with your use of our services or your violation of these Terms and Conditions. 11. Governing Law These Terms and Conditions shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of England. Any disputes arising from or relating to these terms shall be resolved in the courts of England. 12. Changes to These Terms AquaBet reserves the right to modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new terms on our website. Your continued use of our services following the posting of changes constitutes your acceptance of those changes. 13. Contact Us If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at aquabet@gmail.com. England Thank you for choosing AquaBet. We look forward to helping you create an unforgettable casino experience on the high seas! 12. Changes to These Terms AquaBet reserves the right to modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. pages.thanks: Thank You - AquaBet: We Appreciate Your Visit body { font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: #f4f4f4; text-align: center; padding: 50px; } h1 { color: #333; } p { color: #666; font-size: 18px; } .back { max-width: 300px; background-color: #0865df; margin: auto; align-items: center; text-align: center; padding: 10px; transition: 0.3s; cursor: pointer; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); text-decoration: none; } .back:hover { background-color: white; border: 2px solid #0865df; transition: 0.3s; color: black; transition: 0.3s; } Thank You! We sincerely appreciate your interest in AquaBet and taking the time to visit our website. We are thrilled to have the opportunity to help you plan an unforgettable casino party on the high seas. Whether you're looking for an exciting night of casino games, elegant entertainment, or a unique cruise experience, we are here to make your event spectacular. If you have any questions or need further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us at aquabet@gmail.com. We look forward to working with you! Best wishes, The AquaBet Team Home
